EmailTemplate.description: Used only once for users migrated from u-blox Forum (HTML)
EmailTemplate.name: Communities: Changed Password Email HTML (migrated user only)
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to {!Community_Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to the {!Community_Name}!
We would like to inform you that we have migrated the forum to a new portal in order to extend it with additional functionality.
Please click on the link below to reactivate your profile and chose your new password. You will be able to use the new portal immediately.
{!Community_Url}
Greetings,
u-blox team
